Leaflet Control Geocoder Demo

Leaflet-control-geocoder is a simple geocoder form to locate places. Easily extended to multiple data providers.

Here are ready to run demonstrations for searching with:

  • Nominatim
  • Bing
  • Google
  • Photon
  • AddOk

Those demo does not work asis, they need configuration keys:

  • RaveGeo - need some configuration
  • MapQuest - need a api key
  • Mapbox - need access token
